ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, although the 7 year old shouldn t have been left playing un-supervised like he was. Kept getting people killed and stuff and was a complete little brat.
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, although the 7 year old shouldn't have been left playing un-supervised
like he was. Kept getting people killed and stuff and was a complete little
brat. Fortunately I've never run into him again. And I've grouped with some
as young as 14 who were good players.
luv,
-Su

>
> That's one thing I love about this game... It' really isn't designed for
any one particular age group, it's Great for Everybody =D
> Katashaka
> Su <suceress@...> wrote: Yeah, it is amazing the range of ages
of players. I've seen as young as 7
> and as old as 75 playing. My mom plays and she's 52.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > If you don't mind me asking, How old are you two? The reason I ask is I
> > would be curious as to what some of the ages people are who play. Since
> > you mentioned your "retired" that really got me to wondering. ;-)
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > Message: 6
> > Date: Sun, 28 Jul 2002 11:13:58 -0500
> > From: "Orion" <orionv@...>
> > Subject: Re: Re: bazaar
> >
> > My wife and I are both retired and play a lot. We have no life so that
> > makes it even easier....:> Hey it keeps us out of trouble..hehehe
